name: Slime and Numbers
description:
An exciting journey of a small slime into a dungeon, where a lot of numbers, spikes and red relatives are waiting for him, who are not so cute as at first glance!

You play as a slime, who needs to choose a specific combination of numbers that have a certain order! After training, you will not know which number is first and which is last. Here you need to show dexterity and choose the right order!

Controls: UI buttons.

The game was made for IGDA Foundation Game Jam 2022 by 15 y.o. solo developer.

All graphic and code were done by me during the Jam!

It was a combination of school and evening development! Thanks for opportunity to participate, enjoy!
